original_title: Krokus Live at Montreaux Jazz Festival
overview: KROKUS live in concert at the famous and prestigeous "Montreux Jazz Festival" in Montreux, Switzerland. The KROKUS "ROCK THE BLOCK" line-up was captured live in concert at the shores of Lake Geneva on July 20th, 2003.
title: Krokus Live at Montreaux Jazz Festival
